articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Sinhung Machine Plant
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Sinhung Machine Plant
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, gave field guidance to the Sinhung Machine Plant.
					 He looked round the remodeled room for education in the revolutionary history at the plant.
					
					 He stressed the need for the plant to conduct more efficient education in the immortal leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il through the room so that its workers can carry out with loyalty the Party's plan for building an economic power with production of machines as pioneers and scouts in building the economic power, always cherishing the noble intention of the great leaders who had shown loving care for them.
					
					 Then he went round assembly, processing and forging shops and other parts of the plant to learn in detail about the development and production of new products.
					
					 He expressed pleasure over the fact that its officials and workers have made big strides in a drive to produce new kinds of high-performance machines as required by the Party.
					
					 Urging the plant to strive for developing more multi-functional machines of various kinds on the basis of its already-registered successes, he said what is important for the development of the country's machine-building industry is to thoroughly reject dogmatism and adhere to the stand of Juche.
					
					 The plant should keep the production going at a high rate to satisfy the needs of various economic sectors for machines, fulfilling the assigned plan without fail and breaking the world level in the quality of products, he stressed.
					
					 The plant has a very important role to play in building an economic power, he said, setting forth the tasks for updating it to meet the needs of the age of knowledge-based economy and a highly civilized socialist nation so that it can lead the country's machine building industry.
					
					 He expressed belief that the workers of the plant would creditably discharge their heavy yet honorable duty by displaying the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude to overcome manifold difficulties and inheriting the indomitable fighting spirit of the preceding generations.
					
					 He was accompanied by Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Chang Gwang, Jong Sung Il and Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Niger President
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Niger President
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Mahamadou Issoufou on his reelection as president of Niger.
					 The message expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the common interests, wishing the president of Niger greater success in his responsible work for the country's socio-economic development and the national unity.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Myanmar
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Myanmar
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Htin Kyaw on his election as president of Myanmar.
					 The message expressed expectation and belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, wishing the president of Myanmar big success in his responsible work for the country's development and people's well-being.

articles.title: DPRK Red Cross Society Blames Park Geun Hye for Failure of Holding Reunions of Separated Families and Relatives
articles.content:
DPRK Red Cross Society Blames Park Geun Hye for Failure of Holding Reunions of Separated Families and Relatives
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet forces are asserting that more than half of those of the south side who had applied for the reunions of separated families and relatives passed away and the number of those passing away will increase in a crafty bid to give impressions that they are deeply concerned for the reunions.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK in a statement Friday said that lurking behind such assertion is a crafty trick to pass the blame for the failure to hold the reunions on to the DPRK and justify their policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The statement said Park Geun Hye is entirely to blame for the failure to settle Red Cross humanitarian issues between the north and the south including the reunions of separated families and relatives.
					
					 It went on: 
					
					 Last year we ensured the reunions of separated families and relatives on the occasion of the Harvest Moon Day despite so grim situation last year and made a reasonable proposal for fundamentally solving the issue of reunions of separated families and relatives at the December north-south authorities talks.
					
					 But the Park Geun Hye group categorically rejected the DPRK's just proposal but pushed the north-south relations into the lowest ebb at the instigation of its American master, thus cutting off all ways of settling humanitarian issues.
					
					 The north-south relations have been put to a total collapse by the Park Geun Hye group's frantic moves for escalating confrontation with its fellow countrymen and this resulted in totally blocking the reunions so much desired by separated families and relatives.
					
					 As long as the Chongwadae is bossed by traitor and confrontation fanatic Park Geun Hye without an equal, there can never be any humanitarian exchange including the reunions of separated families and relatives. This is our principled stand.
					
					 Trouble-maker of the nation Park Geun Hye will have to pay a very high price for rubbing salt into the wounds of the separated families and relatives again by bringing the north-south relations to a total collapse.

articles.title: Commendations to Contributors to Successful Power Station Project
articles.content:
Commendations to Contributors to Successful Power Station Project
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The title of DPRK labor hero, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize, Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize and other titles of honor, orders and medals were awarded to the shock brigade members and commanding officials who performed labor feats in the construction of power stations in tiers on the Chongchon River, workers and officials of the units concerned, scientists and technicians who contributed to the construction.
					 According to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly on March 25, the title of DPRK labor hero went to 5, Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize to 5, Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize to 4, title of People's Designer to 1, title of Merited Designer to 1, title of Merited Scientist to 2, title of Merited Builder to 3, title of Merited Driver to 7, Order of National Flag First Class to 179, Order of Labour to 236, Order of National Flag Second Class to 1,432, Order of National Flag Third Class to 2,824, Distinguished Military Service Medal to 4 and Merit Medal to 2,764.

articles.title: New School Year Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
New School Year Begins in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The new school year began on Friday in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea where the universal 12-year compulsory education system is enforced.
					 According to Han Yong Hun, vice-minister of Food and Consumer Goods Industries, all new entrants of primary schools throughout the country were provided with new school uniforms, bags and school things under the care of the Party and the state.
					
					 When KCNA visited Pothonggang Primary School in Pothonggang District, Pyongyang, teachers and pupils of senior classes were warmly welcoming the new entrants with colorful tapes and confetti.
					
					 Kim Ryong Ju, a newcomer to the school, said he was very grateful to the respected Marshal Kim Jong Il for having provided school uniforms and bags.
					
					 His mother Pak Hyon Hui said in tears that she again felt the Workers' Party of Korea's loving care for the younger generation.
					
					 Looking with satisfaction at his child study in a multi-functional classroom, Jo Yong Chol said that he would work harder for the socialist system where the children of working people like him can learn to their hearts' content without any school expenses.

articles.title: New School Year Begins at Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disabilities
articles.content:
New School Year Begins at Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disabilities
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A new school year ceremony took place at the Korean Rehabilitation Centre for Children with Disabilities on Friday.
					 Present at the ceremony were Kim Mun Chol, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled, nurses, teachers and doctors of the centre and children and their parents.
					
					 The participants looked round the centre.

articles.title: New School Year Begins in DPRK
articles.content:
New School Year Begins in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A new school year began today with due ceremonies at the institutions of higher learning and schools across the DPRK.
					 Officials of party and power organs, teachers, students and parents welcomed the new students and pupils.
					
					 After the ceremonies there were first lessons of the new school year.

articles.title: Excavation of Site of Royal Palace of Koryo Dynasty Makes Successful Progress
articles.content:
Excavation of Site of Royal Palace of Koryo Dynasty Makes Successful Progress
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Historians and researchers of the DPRK have conducted brisk excavation of Manwoltae in Kaesong this year, too, true to the government's policy of preserving national heritage.
					 Scholars and researchers of the DPRK Archaeological Society and the Korean Central History Museum have completed the unearthing and survey of sites of buildings Nos. 10 and 14 in block No. 6 in the western structure section of Manwoltae and their drainage system in half a month since they started it in mid-March.
					
					 They discovered relic layer of building site and other relics helpful to ascertaining the architectural style of the Royal Palace in the period of Koryo Dynasty and historical years of the buildings.
					
					 Particularly noteworthy is a stone structure of flower shape spread in six directions. 
					
					 The DPRK historians and researchers have confirmed the sites of dozens of palace buildings, large stone stairs and well sites at Manwoltae in Kaesong and discovered at least 22 000 relics such as metal type dating back to the Koryo Dynasty, enriching the treasure house of the cultural heritages of the Korean nation.
					
					 They are now stepping up the unearthing of the western structure section at Manwoldae with a goal to carry it out this year when the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea will be held.

articles.title: Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Open
articles.content:
Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games Open
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Mangyongdae Prize Sports Contest was opened with due ceremony at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium on Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It will be held in Pyongyang, Nampho and Sariwon cities, Kowon County and other places. Its participants will compete in dozens of events including football, basketball, volleyball, table tennis, weightlifting and wrestling.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae and Ro Tu Chol, officials concerned, players and coaches, youth and students and other people in the city.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony there took place a men's volleyball game between the April 25 Sports Team and the Amnokgang Sports Team.

articles.title: "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 9 Published in DPRK
articles.content:
"Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 9 Published in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- "Collection of Kim Il Sung's Anecdotes" Vol. 9, a cycle of revolutionary anecdotes, was published in the DPRK.
					 The book has four chapters which deal with the revolutionary anecdotes of President Kim Il Sung in the period of leading the work to fulfill the first national economy plan in the DPRK and build the regular revolutionary armed forces from July to December, Juche 36 (1947).
					
					 Chapter 33 carries anecdotes about the facts that he laid a solid foundation of self-supporting national economy through his energetic leadership.
					
					 Chapter 34 carries anecdotes about the tireless efforts made by him while providing ceaseless field guidance to arouse the broad popular masses to the struggle for fulfilling the national economy plan.
					
					 Chapter 35 deals with anecdotes telling about the deep loving care shown by him for bringing up the children of revolutionary martyrs as the builders of a new country. Among them are those telling about the devoted efforts made by him for training talents of the nation and providing the people with a new civilized life in the liberated country.
					
					 Chapter 36 carries anecdotes telling about the undying exploits he performed by working heart and soul to build the regular armed forces.

articles.title: Partiality of Present International Political Order Disclosed
articles.content:
Partiality of Present International Political Order Disclosed
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A commentator at the Institute of International Political Studies of the DPRK released an article disclosing the partiality of the present international political order.
					 Today's international political arena has been reduced to the big power-centered one of violence where injustice, strong-arm politics, hegemony, arbitrary practices, aggression and domination prevail and even the most elementary principle of international relations is disregarded, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The outrageous U.S.-led imperialist forces are openly violating the sovereignty and right to existence of weak or small countries, hell-bent on undisguised domination and intervention.
					
					 The "privileged" forces lording it over the international arena including the UN have wantonly trampled down the independent demand and interests of the majority of developing countries and unilaterally settled all matters as they pleased.
					
					 The trend of the tense situation surrounding the DPRK is the epitome of the world politics getting extremely unfair and corrupt and its clearest proof.
					
					 Terming the DPRK an entity that can never be pardoned by the international community and "source of evil", the U.S. and its followers are imposing the harshest-ever economic sanctions and military pressure upon the DPRK.
					
					 They are mobilizing huge nuclear strike means and special ops forces targeting the DPRK, openly crying out for "its regime change" and "collapse of its social system" after terming its declaration of an access to miniaturized H-bomb and military measures for self-defence a "serious threat" to world peace and security" and "provocation."
					
					 As for the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons raised by the hostile forces as a serious matter, it was an entirely just choice made by it to defend its sovereignty, dignity and right to existence from the aggression of the U.S. which has threatened and blackmailed it with nuclear weapons and imposed sanctions and pressure of all forms upon it for decades.
					
					 It is preposterous that the U.S. and its allies are terming the Juche-based satellite launch of the DPRK an "ICBM test" and "violation of UN resolution." 
					
					 The world has witnessed satellites of many countries including the U.S. carried into space by rockets. It is no more than a gangster's far-fetched assertion that only the DPRK's carrier rocket threatens world peace and security.
					
					 What is problematic is a despicable situation in which some big powers allegedly taking a serious view of their own faces and justifications have kowtowed to the U.S. under its base pressure and demand and danced to the tune of pro-American prostitute of south Korea.
					
					 The situation is so gruesome that attempts are made to suppress justice and truth with something produced through behind-the-door conspiracy with this or that country, unhesitatingly reneging on the precious relations of friendship, the common gain made at the cost of blood. In face of this deplorable reality we can not but look squarely to discern the false side of world politics from truth.
					
					 The present world political landscape has turned into a foul gambling table over which a few big powers are closeted together to hatch plots and get in collusion or reject each other to meet their own interests at the beck and call of the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. formally puts the UN in the focus of world politics to cover up its aggressive and hegemonic true colors. It lets the five permanent members of the UN Security Council nominally discuss, decide, implement and supervise all issues, big or small, that occur in the different parts of the world.
					
					 But a scrutiny into the situation proves it to be absurd and extremely unusual.
					
					 Frankly speaking, a big question is whether those five countries styling themselves big powers do any longer have justifications and rights to speak for other countries in the international political arena called the UN.
					
					 No country asked them to settle or decide something in place of them and those countries are not able to do that.
					
					 Humankind stands at crucial crossroads of whether it explores the new era of historical development with independence and justice or it retreats as they do now to the primitive dark era governed by jungle law.
					
					 It is necessary to bring about a bold dramatic change in the unfair and unjust world political order, not just lamenting it.
					
					 If conscience and intellect exist in the world and if there is passion and enthusiasm for truth and justice, people should courageously rise up against the present unfair international political situation.
					
					 We, under the uplifted banner of nuclear treasured sword for justice and peace, will take the lead in the struggle for setting right the unfair international order set by the U.S. and the improper attitude of big and small countries blindly trying to get "accustomed" to it, and for building a genuine human society, fair human society where each country and nation is guaranteed sovereignty and equality and people cooperate with each other based on trust and mutual respect.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Had Better Stop Nuclear Saber-rattling against DPRK: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers Had Better Stop Nuclear Saber-rattling against DPRK: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- When the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors of south Korea are bluffing with "high-density strike" and "operation for advancing into inland area of the north", parts of their large-scale joint military exercises aimed to "bring down its social system," the DPRK is powerfully demonstrating the capability of Juche-based nuclear treasured sword, the capability to fight an actual war to inflict a final doom on the enemies at a single blow.
					 This is evidenced by the exercise of tank crew and the successful simulated test of atmospheric re-entry of a ballistic rocket in the wake of a ballistic rocket launching drill staged in the way of exploding nuclear warhead in the designated altitude under the simulated conditions of attacking the ports in the enemy-controlled area to which overseas aggression forces would be hurled.
					
					 Much upset by the self-defensive counteroffensive made by the DPRK not giving them a breathing spell, the U.S. bellicose forces made shrill cries that the U.S. missile shield failed to prove its capability to protect its mainland from the missile attack of the north. The south Korean puppet forces are trembling with fear that when the barrage of fire would be showered on their heads.
					
					 Under this situation Western media recently asserted that the "theory of collapse" of the DPRK does not sound plausible and the best way is to settle the issue by the way of co-existing with the nuclear DPRK.
					
					 An article posted by Christopher Black, a judicial figure of Canada, on GLOBALRESEARCH. CA on March 21 said that the U.S. is busy with military drills aimed to "bring down the social system" in north Korea while applying no sanctions against Israel which reportedly had access to nuclear weapons. Strong counteraction against them is the legitimate right of north Korea for self-defence, it noted, adding that in order to bring peace to the Korean peninsula it is necessary to give up "pressure" on it, approach its government with dignity and open the door of dialogue with it so that justice and logic may reign.
					
					 Reddit and other media of the U.S. and its experts on Korean affairs said that the solution to the nuclear issue of north Korea through "collapse" and "regime change" that has been sought by the U.S. so far is outdated and impossible, its Korea policy reached the limit and diplomatic method through negotiations is the only way for settling the issue.
					
					 As commented by the media, the U.S. should properly judge the reality.
					
					 The DPRK is the military power possessed of strong nuclear treasured sword of Juche.
					
					 The frantic anti-DPRK war exercises being staged by the U.S. and the puppet group of traitors are adventurous acts of precipitating their self-destruction out of their megalomania about force.
					
					 Once the DPRK is determined, the Korean-style operation for preemptive attack will be staged the way the world has never seen to blow up all the bases of aggression, big and small, at once.
					
					 The best way for the U.S. to protect its mainland from nuclear radioactivity is to halt its nuclear war games on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Just Preemptive Attack Is DPRK's Mode of Counteraction: Rodong Siunmun
articles.content:
Just Preemptive Attack Is DPRK's Mode of Counteraction: Rodong Siunmun
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK decided to take preemptive attack as the mode of its military counteraction so as to be able to deal merciless annihilating blows at the enemies under the grave situation where they are working with bloodshot eyes to encroach upon the DPRK's dignity, sovereignty and vital rights.
					 Rodong Sinmun says this in an article Friday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is quite natural exercise of the right to self-defence for the DPRK to counter the enemies with merciless toughest measure as they are going to bring down "its social system".
					
					 The recent joint military drills are the largest-ever saber-rattling for a nuclear war against the DPRK the U.S. and its followers are staging in the most undisguised and vicious manner after shaking off the hackneyed mask of "annual" and "defensive" ones.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are openly asserting that the joint military drills are aimed to confirm the possibility of applying to an actual war the "beheading operation" targeting the headquarters of the Korean revolution, surprise landing operation for occupying strategic vantage points and the operation for mounting a preemptive attack on nuclear striking means of the DPRK.
					
					 To protest after being hit by U.S. preemptive attack will be of no use.
					
					 Very suggestive is the plight of those countries in various parts of the world that failed to counter the U.S. war moves.
					
					 Preemptive attack is the only way of disabling the U.S. sudden surprise attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The right to nuclear preemptive attack is by no means the U.S. monopoly.
					
					 The reply of the DPRK is to counter the preemptive attack with advanced preemptive attack.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Youth to Work Miracles in 70-Day Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls upon Youth to Work Miracles in 70-Day Campaign
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Every site of the campaign including Mt. Paektu area is seething with ardent enthusiasm, resolute will and bravery of the members of the young vanguard to create new legendry tales about heroic young people and Mallima speed, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an editorial.
					 Noting that it is the characteristic feature of the Korean youth to rise up as one true to the call of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and perform undying feats to be recorded in the history of the country, the editorial goes on:
					
					 The 70-day campaign of loyalty is a drive to devotedly defend the leadership authority of the WPK with ardent fidelity of all the people and a fierce standoff with the U.S. imperialists and their followers making desperate efforts through heinous provocations. Now is the time for the Korean youths, heroes of the youth power and stalwart fighters in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, to show the world once again how admirable they are as they are inspired by the party's politics of attaching importance to the youth.
					
					 The youth are taking the lead in the ongoing general offensive ushering in the greatest heyday of the revolution under the leadership of the great party and their work-style is self-reliance and fortitude and their goal is to create fresh legendary tales about heroic youth. The youths should dash forward along the road of the Korean revolution in the spirit of the blizzards of Paektu and deal telling blows at the hostile forces through the above-said tales and greet the Seventh Congress of the WPK as a glorious congress of victors.
					
					 The editorial calls on all the young people to dash forward towards the May event of victory, flying high the flag of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League in the van of the ranks of the ongoing general offensive.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on WPK's Line of Simultaneously Developing Two Fronts
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in March of 2013 set forth the line of simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. This is a strategic line to achieve the final victory, not a temporary countermeasure to cope with the fast-changing situation. 
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday says in an article in this regard:
					
					 The DPRK's line of simultaneously developing the two fronts is crystal of the WPK's steadfast faith and will to finally conclude the confrontation with the U.S. by bolstering up the nuclear force for self-defence in every way which reflects the transparent idea of national independence and the Songun revolutionary leadership history of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and to build the best power and people's paradise on this land as early as possible.
					
					 The WPK laid down the above-said strategic line at a time when the U.S. imperialists and their followers were putting the political and military pressure unprecedented in the history upon the DPRK. This was something which no one could ever do.
					
					 In the last period, some countries attempted to develop nuclear weapons, but finally yielded to the collective pressure of the U.S. imperialists and powers in collusion with them. Those countries did so because of lack of courage and will. 
					
					 Only the great WPK possessed of noble responsibility and rare insight into the eternal future of the country and the nation could make such a crucial decision for preserving the peace on the Korean peninsula and successfully put it into practice.
					
					 Steadfast are the faith and will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to preserve peace and stability on the peninsula and build a world of justice by dint of nuclear deterrent for self-defence, the shield for peace and treasured sword for national independence, under the banner of the great line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 This line whose vitality is being fully displayed with each passing day will always provide a sure guarantee for lasting peace, reunification and prosperity on this land.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Action against Construction of Naval Base on Jeju Island Slammed
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities' Crackdown upon Action against Construction of Naval Base on Jeju Island Slammed
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea in a statement on March 30 denounced the puppet military group for their action to crack down upon inhabitants and peace activists who turned out in a struggle against the construction of the naval base on Jeju Island.
					 The statement hit out at the naval force for suppressing inhabitants in Kangjong village and peace activists, who conducted a peaceful protest action, by passing the buck for the delayed construction upon them. 
					
					 The statement declared that organizations opposed to the construction project would carry on the positive protest action against the unreasonable crackdown by the naval force and the regime in solidarity with inhabitants in Kangjong village on Jeju Island and peace activists.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Demands Stop to Military Cooperation with Japan
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Demands Stop to Military Cooperation with Japan
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference outside the Defense Ministry on March 30 in demand of a stop to military cooperation with Japan.
					 The body recalled that the Japan's Navy "Self-Defense Force" chief of Staff visited south Korea to have talks with Navy Chief of Staff of south Korea on March 28. It said his goal was to boost up military cooperation including sharing information about north Korean missiles and staging joint military drills with south Korea.
					
					 The body expressed concern that it would pave the way for Japan to stage a comeback to the Korean peninsula and make a preemptive attack on the north and help build a triangular missile defense system including the U.S. and form a military alliance, thereby escalating the military confrontation in Northeast Asia and making south Korea dependent on Japan militarily. The new Cold War structure to be built in Northeast Asia would surely delay peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula, the body said, and went on:
					
					 It noted that the south Korean authorities desperately try to bring in Japan which had invaded and ruled Korea as part of the moves to pressurize the north by force of arms.
					
					 It urged the authorities to stop tightening the military nexus with Japan and halt their involvement in the building of the triangular missile defense system and military nexus.

articles.title: Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Egypt
articles.content:
Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed in Egypt
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed in Cairo on March 27.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various functions to praise the immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and give wide publicity to them from the end of March.

articles.title: Personage of Kyrgyzstan Backs DPRK's Special Statement
articles.content:
Personage of Kyrgyzstan Backs DPRK's Special Statement
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A. Usupbayev, chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and chief of the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, on March 18 made public a statement in support of a special statement issued by the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK.
					 He said that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean authorities are extremely straining the situation on the Korean peninsula, adding:
					
					 However, they should consider that the DPRK is utterly different from Afghanistan and Iraq.
					
					 The DPRK is an independent and legitimate state, nuclear country and satellite manufacturer and launcher.
					
					 As it clarified, the right to preemptive attack is not a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					 The People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea fully support the special statement issued by the government, political parties and organizations of the DPRK that the Korean people will turn out as one in the sacred struggle to devotedly defend the leader and mercilessly smash the enemy's provocations.
					
					 And we demand the U.S. roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and replace the armistice agreement with a peace pact to make a substantial contribution to peace and security on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Punishment of Park Geun Hye Group of Traitors Urged by Koreans in Germany
articles.content:
Punishment of Park Geun Hye Group of Traitors Urged by Koreans in Germany
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Society for Cooperation among Koreans in Germany in a statement on March 26 called for punishing the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					 The statement said that the "agreement" on the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army is a crime against humanity that insults the victims who were forcibly taken by the Imperial Japanese Army and were forced into barbarous sexual slavery, accusing Park Geun Hye of selling off the soul of the nation for a few pennies.
					
					 Park Geun Hye is a fascist dictator as she forcibly disbanded an opposition party and threw even a lawmaker behind bars on a groundless charge after coming to power, the statement said.
					
					 She viciously took issue with the nuclear deterrence for self-defence and the righteous space development activities of the fellow countrymen in the north, completely shut down the Kaesong Industrial Zone and introduced all type U.S. nuclear war means into south Korea, thereby pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the brink of a nuclear war, the statement charged.
					
					 The statement called for punishing Park Geun Hye and the "Saenuri Party" at the upcoming "National Assembly" election to eliminate the pro-Japanese remnants and bring down the dictatorial regime.

articles.title: British Organizations Urge Park Geun Hye to Respond to Ultimatum of DPRK Army
articles.content:
British Organizations Urge Park Geun Hye to Respond to Ultimatum of DPRK Army
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- It is the only way out for Park Geun Hye to honestly respond to the ultimatum of the DPRK army.
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Korean Friendship Association UK said this in their joint statement on March 27.
					
					 The statement said:
					
					 The long-range artillery force of the large combined unit of the Korean People's Army on the front sent the ultimatum urging Park and her group to make an official apology to all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad for their high treason.
					
					 As known, the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces dared to stage the so-called "precision strike drill" aimed at the office of the headquarters of the DPRK.
					
					 It is the most unpardonable crime, which deserves the severest punishment they can neither defend themselves nor evade.
					
					 If Park and her group do not respond to the ultimatum of the KPA, the long-range artillery force of the KPA large combined unit on the front will go into a merciless military action.

articles.title: Peruvian Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Peruvian Newspaper Praises Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The March 22-April 22 issue of the Peruvian newspaper Accion Nacionalista carried a special write-up on the occasion of the 23rd anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					 The newspaper edited an article titled "Highest respect to Comrade Kim Jong Il" with a painting depicting the true picture of the single-minded unity of the DPRK's army and people rallied firmly around the party and leader.
					
					 The article said that Kim Jong Il was born as the son of Mt. Paektu, grew up hearing the gun report of the anti-Japanese war as a lullaby, developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and made an immortal contribution to consolidating the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 It is his greatest exploit that he formulated the Songun politics into the main political mode under socialism, it said, and went on:
					
					 HE Kim Jong Il conducted energetic activities to develop the world socialist movement.
					
					 He protected the socialist cause with his Songun Politics, which is his most remarkable feat.

articles.title: WPK Praised by Nigerian Body
articles.content:
WPK Praised by Nigerian Body
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted an article titled "Party of Comrades Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il" on its website on March 22.
					 The article said that the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) is the great party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The President was the outstanding leader who founded the WPK, consolidated it into the guiding force of the DPRK's society and glorified it as the prestige one leading the cause of human independence, it noted.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into the one of Kim Il Sung and the powerful guiding force of the Songun revolution and led it to victories, thus laying an eternal groundwork for building a thriving nation, it said, adding:
					
					 The DPRK advancing toward a thriving nation while demonstrating its might as a political and military giant, full-fledged nuclear country and satellite manufacturer and launcher, would be unthinkable without the exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It is the iron will and unshakable faith of HE Kim Jong Un and all members of the WPK to glorify it as the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for all ages.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Libya
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Libya
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- A Libyan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed on March 26.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Ethiopia
Pyongyang, April 1 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Penguin Publishing House of Ethiopia on March 24.
					 The work published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012) deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble career characterized by his love for the country and its people.
					
					 It also indicates the important matters of embodying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Maquinas de Sinhung
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre Fabrica de Maquinas de Sinhung
Pyongyang, 1 de abril (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas de Sinhung.
					El Mariscal recorrio la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria, reedificada nuevamente.
					
					Alli subrayo que deben realizar con mas eficacia la educacion sobre las inmortales hazanas de direccion de los grandes Lideres a traves de la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria para que los obreros de la fabrica no olviden ni un momento el cordial amor y el noble espiritu del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y materialicen con fidelidad el proyecto del Partido para la construccion de la potencia economica como exploradores y soldados de patrulla de esta causa, logrando un gran exito en la produccion de las maquinas y equipos.
					
					El Mariscal averiguo en detalles el estado de desarrollo y produccion de nuevos equipos en los talleres de montaje, elaboracion y forja y otros lugares de la fabrica.
					
					Dijo con gran alegria que los funcionarios y obreros de la fabrica lograron muchos exitos al cabo de haber desplegado la lucha dinamica por fabricar nuevas maquinas y equipos de alta capacidad conforme a las tareas dadas por el Partido.
					
					A base de los exitos logrados, deben desplegar la lucha dinamica por desarrollar mayor cantidad de maquinas e instalaciones multifuncionales de varios tipos, dijo y continuo que lo importante en el desarrollo de la industria mecanica es rechazar perfectamente el dogmatismo y mantener con firmeza la posicion autoctona.
					
					Continuo que tienen que normalizar la produccion en alto nivel para satisfacer las demandas de varios dominios de la economia nacional, cumplir infaliblemente el plan y superar el nivel mundial en lo cualitativo.
					
					El Mariscal senalo que la fabrica tiene la mision importantisima en la construccion de la potencia economica y presento las tareas para modernizarla conforme a la demanda de la epoca de economia basada en conocimientos y a la figura del pais civilizado socialista para que pueda conducir la industria mecanica de nuestro pais.
					
					Y expreso una gran esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de Sinhung superaran todo tipo de dificultades poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de apoyo en las propias fuerzas y de tenaz lucha y cumplieran perfectamente con su mision importante y honrosa al heredar el indomable espiritu combativo de las generaciones antecedentes.
					
					Al Mariscal le acompanaron Jo Yong Won, Hong Yong Chil, Kim Chang Gwang, Jong Sung Il y Yun Tong Hyon.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a Htin Kyaw
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje de felicitacion a Htin Kyaw
Pyongyang, primero de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio la vispera un mensaje de felicitacion a Htin Kyaw, electo presidente de la Republica de la Union de Myanmar.
					El remitente expresa su esperanza y conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises se intensificaran y se desarrollaran mas en el futuro. Y formula votos por grandes exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario para lograr el desarrollo del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Niger
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Niger
Pyongyang, primero de abril (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, remitio el 31 de marzo a Mahamadou Issoufou, reelecto presidente de la Republica del Niger.
					El remitente desea al destinatario mayores exitos en las responsabilidades paara lograr el desarrollo socio-economico del pais y la unidad nacional.
					
					Manifiesta la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion existentes entre los dos paises se fortaleceran y se desarrollaran mas conforme a los intereses comunes.

articles.title: Impedimento de encuentro de familiares se debe a Park Geun-hye, senala ACR
articles.content:
Impedimento de encuentro de familiares se debe a Park Geun-hye, senala ACR
Pyongyang, primero de abril (ACNC) -- En estos tiempos la banda titere surcoreana actua con astucia como si tuviera algun interes en el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados diciendo que ya fallecieron mas de la mitad de los solicitantes surcoreanos y se aumentara mas el numero de los perecidos.
					El portavoz del Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja (ACR) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en su declaracion publicada este viernes, revela que en esta artimana esta ocultado el intento taimado de justificar la politica conflictiva anti-RPDC imputandole la culpabilidad del impedimento del encuentro de familiares y parientes separados, y prosigue:
					
					La no resolucion de los problemas humanitarios de la cruz roja entre ambas partes coreanas inclusive el encuentro en cuestion se debe enteramente a Park Geun-hye.
					
					En la situacion tan tirante del ano pasado, logramos el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados con motivo de Chusok (15 de agosto lunar), y presentamos en las conversaciones de autoridades Norte-Sur sostenidas en diciembre del mismo ano las propuestas racionales para resolver radicalmente el problema de familiares y parientes separados. 
					
					Sin embargo, la horda de Park Geun-hye nego las justas propuestas de la parte connacional y llevo las relaciones intercoreanas a la peor fase conflictiva bajo la instigacion de su amo norteamericano. De esta manera, interrumpio todas las posibilidades para la solucion de los problemas humanitarios. 
					
					Debido a tales freneticas maniobras fratricidas de la banda de Park, se han roto por completo las relaciones intercoreanas, y como su resultado, se pierde totalmente la oportunidad del encuentro que esperan con ansiedad los familiares y parientes separados. 
					
					Mientras que los traidores y maniacos de enfrentamiento fratricida como Park Geun-hye ocupan Chongwadae, no pueden ser realizados jamas los intercambios humanitarios de todos tipos incluso el encuentro de familiares y parientes separados. Esto es la posicion de principios de la RPDC.
					
					Park Geun-hye, origen de calamidades de la nacion, pagara caro el precio de sus crimenes de haber dado otro sablazo a la herida de los familiares y parientes separados.

articles.title: Comentarista de IAPIC revela parcialidad de actual orden politico mundial
articles.content:
Comentarista de IAPIC revela parcialidad de actual orden politico mundial
Pyongyang, primero de abril (ACNC) -- El comentarista del Instituto de Asuntos Politicos Internacionales de Corea (IAPIC) publico un articulo que revela la parcialidad del actual orden politico mundial. 
					El articulo senala que la palestra politica mundial de hoy se ha convertido en la escena caotica violenta en torno a las potencias donde predominan la injusticia, el despotismo, la hegemonia, las arbitrariedades, la agresion y la dominacion y se desprecian hasta los principios mas elementales de las relaciones internacionales, y continua:
					
					Las atroces fuerzas imperialistas acaudilladas por Estados Unidos violan explicitamente la soberania y el derecho a la subsistencia de los paises debiles y pequenos cometiendo la dominacion e intervencion.
					
					Las fuerzas "privilegiadas", que se fingen duenos en la escena internacional incluso la ONU, pisotean flagrantemente las demandas independientes y los intereses de la mayoria de los paises en vias de desarrollo, y tratan unilateralmente todos los problemas conforme a sus gustos.
					
					La evolucion de la situacion tirante en torno a la RPDC constituye el microcosmo y el testigo mas evidente de la politica mundial que se hace extremadamente parcial y corrupta. 
					
					Ahora EE.UU. y sus satelites ejercen a la RPDC la sancion economica y la presion militar sin precedentes describiendola como "origen del mal" y ente intolerable de la sociedad internacional. 
					
					En los ultimos tiempos, insisten abiertamente en el "cambio del poder" y el "derrumbe del regimen" de la RPDC, calificando de "seria amenaza" y "provocacion" a la paz y estabilidad del mundo su declaracion sobre la posesion de bomba de hidrogeno minimizada y sus medidas militares autodefensivas, y movilizan inmensos medios de ataque nucleares y los efectivos de operaciones especiales.
					
					En cuanto a la posesion de armas nucleares de la RPDC en controversia por las fuerzas hostiles, es una justa opcion de autodefensa para defender la soberania, la dignidad y el derecho a la subsistencia frente a las tentativas agresivas de EE.UU. que durante varios decenios vino ejerciendole la amenaza y chantajes nucleares, las sanciones de toda indole y la presion. 
					
					Es irrazonable que EE.UU. y sus satelites censuren el lanzamiento de satelite artificial de la RPDC como "prueba de lanzamiento de misil balistico" y "violacion de la resolucion de la ONU". 
					
					Los satelites artificiales cargados por los cohetes transportadores de EE.UU. y de otros muchos paises se lanzan hacia el espacio. Sin embargo, las fuerzas hostiles persisten en que solo el cohete transportador de la RPDC amenaza la paz y seguridad del mundo, lo cual es una terquedad y sofisteria bandidesca. 
					
					Lo mas problematico es que ocurren oficialmente los casos sucios inimaginables en que hasta algunas potencias que abogan tanto por la importancia de la apariencia y la obligacion, obedecen a la vil coaccion y exigencia de EE.UU. y bailan al son que les toca la prostituta proyanqui.
					
					Un pais intenta pisotear la justicia y la verdad con los supuestos resultados inventados en contubernio secreto con tal o cual pais abandonando sin vacilacion hasta las relaciones de amistad preciosa, conquista comun lograda a precio de la sangre.  Ante esta realidad tragica volvemos a conocer al dedillo de la imagen virtual de la politica mundial y la verdad.
					
					Ahora, la estructura de la politica mundial va corrompiendose completamente en el turbio juego de azar donde bajo el mando de EE.UU., algunas potencias conspiran o rechazan entre si segun los intereses de ellas mismas.
					
					Para encubrir su naturaleza agresiva y hegemonica, EE.UU. pone la ONU al frente de la politica mundial y por nominacion, preconiza que los 5 paises miembros permanentes del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU discuten, determinan, ejecutan y controlan todas las cosas grandes y pequenas ocurridas en todos los lugares de la Tierra.
					
					Pero, al investigarlo, este hecho mismo es muy absurdo y anormal.
					
					Francamente dicho, queremos preguntar si los 5 paises autodenominados como potencias, tienen la calificacion o el derecho a representar otros paises en la escena politica internacional, o sea en la ONU. 
					
					Nadie les solicito resolver o decidir algo en lugar de si mismo. Y ellos mismos no tienen la capacidad de hacerlo. 
					
					Ahora la humanidad se encuentra en el dilema de abrir con la independencia y la justicia una nueva era de desarrollo de la historia o retroceder de continuo a la epoca primitiva tenebrosa donde reinaba la ley de la selva.
					
					Hay que renovar con audacia el orden politico mundial tan parcial e injusto, en lugar de lamentarlo.
					
					Si en este mundo existen la conciencia, la cordura y la aspiracion a la veracidad y justicia, es preciso oponerse rotundamente a la actual politica internacional.
					
					Teniendo el disuasivo nuclear como remedio todopoderoso para la defensa de la justicia y la paz, la RPDC estara al frente de la lucha por rectificar el parcial orden internacional, establecido por EE.UU., y el proceder de los paises grandes o pequenos que tratan de "adiestrarse" en ello a ciegas, y construir una autentica e imparcial sociedad humana donde se aseguren la soberania e igualdad de todos los paises y naciones y cooperen entre si en el principio de la confianza y respeto mutuos.

articles.title: ACNC aboga por desmantelar campana de guerra nuclear en Peninsula Coreana
articles.content:
ACNC aboga por desmantelar campana de guerra nuclear en Peninsula Coreana
Pyongyang, primero de abril (ACNC) -- En la actualidad, Estados Unidos y la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye libran los ejercicios militares conjuntos de gran tamano destinados a derrumbar el regimen de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo del "golpe a modo de pinzas" y "operacion de avance al interior". Precisamente en este momento, la RPDC manifiesta a todo el mundo su poderosa capacidad de guerra real y poderio de las autoctonas fuerzas armadas nucleares dispuestas a arrasar de un golpe a los enemigos.
					Lo comprueban el entrenamiento de lanzamiento del cohete balistico a manera de explotar la ojiva nuclear en la altitud fijada de los supuestos puertos enemigos, el ruido de los tanques y otros pertrechos ultramodernos  y la prueba de ambiente para reentrada de cohete balistico en atmosfera.
					
					Ante la sucesiva contraofensiva de autodefensa de la RPDC, la capa belicista estadounidense dice perpleja que "el sistema antimisil de EE.UU. no testimonio la capacidad capaz de defender el territorio principal desde el ataque de misiles del Norte", mientras los titeres surcoreanos estan muy inquietados sin saber cuando puedan recibir una lluvia de proyectiles.
					
					Bajo tales circunstancias, los medios de prensa occidentales insisten en que el "rumor de derrumbe" de la RPDC es sospechoso y lo mejor es resolver el problema con el metodo de coexistir con la RPDC pertrechada con las armas nucleares.
					
					La personalidad del circulo juridico de Canada, Christopher Black, publico el 21 de marzo en la pagina web de Internet GLOBALRESEARCH.CA un articulo intitulado "Corea: logica de la paz y la guerra".
					
					En su nota el subrayo que EE.UU. no ejerce una sancion a Israel, pero recurre a los ejercicios militares encaminados al "derrumbe del regimen" del Norte de Corea. Prosiguio que el Norte de Corea se le enfrenta con super-intransigencia, lo que es su merecido derecho de autodefensa.
					
					Puntualizo que para llevar la paz en la Peninsula Coreana, hay que renunciar la presion contra el Norte de Corea, tratar con consideracion al gobierno coreano y aceptar la justicia y la logica a traves del dialogo.
					
					El sitio web de prensa de EE.UU., Reddit y otras publicaciones y los especialistas de los asuntos coreanos, insisten en que el remedio para resolver el problema nuclear del Norte de Corea mediante el "derrumbe" y el "cambio del poder" perseguido hasta ahora por EE.UU., es viejo e imposible en este tiempo.
					
					Subrayaron que la estrategia de EE.UU. sobre el Norte de Corea ha llegado al limite y el remedio para la solucion del problema nuclear del Norte de Corea es nada mas que el metodo diplomatico a traves de las negociaciones.
					
					Como la opinion publica evalua unanimemente, EE.UU. debe juzgar bien la realidad.
					
					La RPDC es la potencia militar que poseyo las poderosas fuerzas armadas nucleares de Juche.
					
					Los freneticos ejercicios belicos de EE.UU. y la horda traidora del Sur de Corea son la locura aventurera que acelera su autodestruccion.
					
					Si una vez decidimos, la operacion del ataque preventivo al estilo coreano para aniquilar todos los nidos grandes y pequenos de la agresion se cumplira como relampago con el modo desconocido por todo el mundo.
					
					Sera la mejor medida abandonar la campana de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana para evitar  que el territorio principal de EE.UU. se convierta en la zona contaminada por radiactividad nuclear.
